attributes.action: Freeze all Salaries, Expenses and start making all Civil Servants MPs pay for their  Pensionsa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Mr Brown keeps telling the public we are in totally different circumstances well ITS TIME YOU ALL GET REAL . We the taxpayers are suffering badly and we are your employers, and at the moment we see no sign of caring from anyone of you. Right now Jackie Smith shows no sign of caring she has a piece of paper which she, and many other MPs, think absolves her from living in our World - WRONG. It is time to change the Rules and make all of you suffer like you are making us suffer. GET REAL OR GET OUT.
Mrs. Eileen Grierson. OAP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
